x_8821_code_code_snippet.description: Being able to generate a random alphanumeric string is useful in certain contexts and scenarios, such as: • To update a random, harmless field on a table in order to trigger business rules to occur on that table. • Generating a temporary passcode, perhaps used to reset a user's password in conjunction with a reset notification.
x_8821_code_code_snippet.name: How to Create a Random Passcode
